div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1373 Trabzon (anc. Trapezus), Pontus, 1947 or earlier Burial: early 2nd cent. B.C. (M) Contents: 3+ AR Athens: 2 New Style tetradr. Eumenes II: 1 tetradr. Disposition: dispersed Information from E. S. G. Robinson According to Thompson's chronology, the two Athenian coins are dated 187/6 and 186/5 B.C.
